named-query.name: LexicalPattern-exists-by-text-and-User-and-Tags
named-query.query: SELECT l.id FROM LexicalPattern l JOIN l.nlPatternId n JOIN n.tagsCollection g WHERE (l.text = :text) AND ((n.checkedOutByUserEmail = 'nobody') OR (NOT n.checkedOutByUserEmail = :userId)) AND ((n.underConstructionByUserEmail = 'nobody') OR (n.underConstructionByUserEmail = :userId)) AND (g.label IN :tags)
